property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TextEditingPreference (a Application).

property.name: dragAndDropTextInLayout
property.shortdesc: If true, allows text to be dragged and dropped on a layout page.

property.name: allowDragAndDropTextInStory
property.shortdesc: If true, allows text to be dragged and dropped in the story editor or galley view.

property.name: tripleClickSelectsLine
property.shortdesc: If true, a triple click selects a line of text. If false, a triple click selects a paragraph.

property.name: smartCutAndPaste
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically adjusts spacing among words and between words and punctuation marks when cutting and pasting text.

property.name: singleClickConvertsFramesToTextFrames
property.shortdesc: If true, a single click (with the Type tool) converts non-text frames to text frames.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextEditingPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
